text:
Hey dude - sorry for the late response. I've been feeling under the weather these last few days.

In terms of salary, there are surveys which can give you that information. In terms of job satisfaction, I don't do a research job so I can't speak from experience - but I have found a couple of websites that will hopefully give you an insight...one of them includes a free quiz to see if it thinks your personality is one that might enjoy a job in research. 

You can do a conversion course to go from Biology to medicine (see link) but it will take more time, which also means more money. I know of a few people who have done it, but the main route is to go directly into medicine. 

What other A-levels are you doing?
